name: trilium-notes
description: Trilium Next is a self-hosted hierarchical note-taking and knowledge management app. It supports rich text, relations, scripting, and synchronization, with desktop clients and a powerful web interface.
features: Hierarchical notes: Organize notes in a tree structure with unlimited nesting for complex knowledge bases.
Rich text editing: Create notes with formatting, images, tables, and embedded content using a WYSIWYG editor.
Note relations: Link notes together with typed relationships for building knowledge graphs and connections.
Scripting: Automate tasks and extend functionality using JavaScript within notes for custom behavior.
Synchronization: Sync notes across devices using built-in sync server for access anywhere.
Desktop clients: Use native desktop applications for Windows, Mac, and Linux with offline access.
Web interface: Access notes through a powerful web interface when away from your desktop.
Encryption: Protect sensitive notes with encryption at rest for privacy and security.
Version history: Track changes to notes over time with automatic versioning and rollback capability.
Full-text search: Find content across all notes using fast full-text search with filters.
Templates: Create note templates for consistent structure in recurring note types.
Export options: Export notes individually or in bulk to HTML, Markdown, or other formats.
